latest news.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024: Final lineup of performers announced ahead of September 11th broadcast
latest news.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) 2024 has announced its final lineup of performers, including Anitta, Karol G, LL Cool J, and Shawn Mendes. The event will take place on September 11th at UBS Arena in New York. Katy Perry will receive the prestigious Video Vanguard Award, with Bruce Gillmer praising her as 'a musical powerhouse and true pop culture icon.' Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 nods, aiming to make history as the first artist to win Video of the Year three times in a row. Other notable nominees include Post Malone, Ariana Grande, and SZA.
latest news.title: MTV VMAs 2024: Final lineup of performers announced ahead of September 11th broadcast

latest news.eng_title: Here's A Handy-Dandy List of Everyone Performing at the 2024 MTV VMAs
latest news.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) is set to take place on September 11 at the UBS Arena in New York. The show will feature a star-studded lineup of performers, including Katy Perry, who will receive the Michael Jackson Video Vanguard Award. Other performers include Sabrina Carpenter, Chappell Roan, GloRilla, Benson Boone, LISA, Halsey, Camila Cabello, Shawn Mendes, Karol G, Rauw Alejandro, Anitta, Lenny Kravitz, and LL Cool J. The performers will showcase their talents in various categories, including Best New Artist, Best Pop, and Best K-Pop. Megan Thee Stallion will host the show, and the event is expected to be filled with iconic moments and memorable performances.
latest news.title: Here's A Handy-Dandy List of Everyone Performing at the 2024 MTV VMAs

latest news.eng_title: The Complete List of Artists Set to Perform at the 2024 MTV VMAs
latest news.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) are set to take place on September 11 at the UBS Arena in New York, celebrating its 40th edition. The initial lineup features Sabrina Carpenter, Rauw Alejandro, Glorilla, Camila Cabello, and Chappell Roan, with additional big names like Karol G, Anitta, Shawn Mendes, and LL Cool J joining the party. The ceremony will honor Katy Perry with the MTV Video Vanguard Award for her 'groundbreaking creative vision.' The event will also feature performances from Halsey, Benson Boone, Lenny Kravitz, and Lisa, among others. The ceremony will have a strong charitable focus, in collaboration with the National Day of Service and Remembrance of 9/11 and Tuesday's Children. Fans can vote on the official MTV website to decide the winners of the night.
latest news.title: The Complete List of Artists Set to Perform at the 2024 MTV VMAs

latest news.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024: Karol G, Camila Cabello, and Anitta to Perform
latest news.summary: The MTV VMAs 2024 will feature a diverse lineup of artists, including Karol G, Camila Cabello, and Anitta. The ceremony will take place on September 11 at the UBS Arena in Long Island, New York. The nominees for Video of the Year include Ariana Grande, Billie Eilish, Doja Cat, Eminem, and SZA. Other categories include Artist of the Year, Song of the Year, Best New Artist, and Best Collaboration. The nominees for Best Latino include Anitta, Bad Bunny, Karol G, Myke Towers, and Peso Pluma & Anitta. The nominees for Best K-Pop include Jung Kook feat. Latto, LISA, NCT DREAM, NewJeans, and Stray Kids. The nominees for Best Afrobeats include Ayra Starr ft. Giveon, Burna Boy, Chris Brown feat. Davido & Lojay, Tems, and Tyla.
latest news.title: Karol G, Camila Cabello y más estrellas latinas entran por la puerta grande de los MTV VMAs 2024

latest news.eng_title: MTV's VMAs 2024 — everything you need to know about the hosts, lineup and more
latest news.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) 2024 is set to take place on September 11 at New York's UBS Arena, with rapper Megan Thee Stallion hosting the event. The ceremony will feature a star-studded lineup, including Katy Perry, who will receive the Video Vanguard Award, and performers such as Sabrina Carpenter, Camila Cabello, and Blackpink's Lisa. Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 total nods, followed by Post Malone with nine nominations. The event will be broadcast on MTV and streamed on Paramount+, starting at 8pm Eastern Time.
latest news.title: MTV's VMAs 2024 — everything you need to know about the hosts, lineup and more

latest news.eng_title: MTV Announces New Performers for VMA 2024
latest news.summary: The MTV has announced the new names that will complete the list of performances at the VMA 2024. Anitta, Shawn Mendes, Karol G, and LL Cool J will take the stage on September 11. The ceremony will be held live at the UBS Arena in New York, USA, and will be hosted by Megan Thee Stallion. The artists announced on Tuesday join the previously announced performers: Camila Cabello, Sabrina Carpenter, Benson Boone, Chappell Roan, GloRilla, Halsey, Lenny Kravitz, LISA, and Rauw Alejandro. Katy Perry will receive the coveted Video Vanguard award and will perform a medley of her greatest hits directly from the stage. This year, the MTV will support the 9/11 Day organization and the Tuesday's Children, which care for the families of the 9/11 victims. Taylor Swift leads the nominees with ten nominations, followed by Post Malone with nine, Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter with six each, Megan Thee Stallion and SZA with five each, and LISA, Olivia Rodrigo, and Teddy Swims with four nominations each. Anitta also broke her personal record with three nominations. Fans can already vote for their favorite artists in 15 categories, including Video of the Year, Best Feature, and Artist of the Year, on the website until August 30. The voting for Breakthrough Artist will remain open until the show date.
latest news.title: Anitta, Shawn Mendes e mais: MTV anuncia novas apresentações do VMA 2024

latest news.eng_title: Anitta and Karol G to Perform at 2024 MTV VMAs
latest news.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards will take place on September 11 in New York's UBS Arena. Brazilian singer Anitta will perform a mix of her hits, including 'Savage Funk' and 'Alegría', and will also debut her new single 'Paradise' live. This will be her third consecutive year hosting the event. Anitta, who may have guests like Fat Joe, DJ Khaled, and Tiago PZK on stage, aims to win the award for 'Best Latin Artist' for the second time. Colombian singer Karol G, who won the award for 'Best Collaboration' last year for her song 'TQG' with Shakira, will also perform some 'surprises' during the ceremony. Other performers include Sabrina Carpenter, Chappell Roan, GloRilla, Camila Cabello, Benson Boone, Halsey, Lenny Kravitz, and Lisa from Blackpink. LL Cool J will also return to the event after a 25-year absence, performing songs from his new album 'The Force'. He previously won an award in 1991 for 'Best Rap'.
latest news.title: Actuarán Anitta y Karol G en los MTV VMAs 2024

latest news.eng_title: Coldplay Releases New Single 'We Pray' and Breaks Rock Tour Revenue Record

Event: Music Of The Spheres World Tour

latest news.summary: Coldplay released their new single 'We Pray' last Friday (23), which features the participation of Little Simz, Burna Boy, Elyanna, and TINI. The song is the second single from their upcoming album 'Moon Music', set to be released on October 4, 2024. The album will be made from 100% recycled plastic bottles (9 per disc). The song is a follow-up to their previous single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove', which was nominated for two MTV VMA's, topped the iTunes charts worldwide, and reached the TOP 1 in the UK airplay chart and the Official Big Top 40. The band's Music Of The Spheres World Tour, which started in March 2022 and has sold over 10 million tickets, is currently at the Ernst Happel Stadium in Vienna. The tour has produced 59% less carbon emissions compared to their previous tour in 2016 and 2017, exceeding their original goal of a 50% reduction. The band has also planted 9 million trees (with an additional 1 million to be planted by the end of the year). Chris Martin, the lead vocalist of Coldplay, paid tribute to Taylor Swift during a show in Vienna, singing her song 'Love Story' with Maggie Rogers. Martin said, 'If this isn't good, please don't put it on YouTube because I don't want to have problems with Taylor.' The band has also dedicated a performance of their song 'Everglow' to Taylor Swift, saying 'This is for Taylor Swift because she left the city.' Coldplay has become the most lucrative rock tour in history, with over $5.1 billion in revenue and 8.8 million tickets sold, according to Billboard Boxscore. They have surpassed Elton John's Farewell Yellow Brick Road tour and the U2 360 tour.
latest news.title: Coldplay reúne astros da música no inédito single 'We Pray'

latest news.eng_title: Megan Thee Stallion to Host MTV VMAs and Receive Multiple Nominations
latest news.summary: Megan Thee Stallion has been chosen to host the MTV VMAs on September 11. She is also nominated for five awards, including Best Collaboration, Best Hip-Hop Video, Best Direction, Best Visual Effects, and Best Art Direction. The 29-year-old artist, whose real name is Megan Jovon Ruth Pete, released her third album, 'Megan', in June, which received positive reviews. One of the singles, 'Hiss', reached number 1 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It is expected that she will also perform at the awards ceremony, which will take place at the UBS Arena in New York. Taylor Swift leads the nominations this year with a total of 10. The music videos competing in the Best Video category are 'We Can't Be Friends (Wait For Your Love)' by Ariana Grande, 'Lunch' by Billie Eilish, 'Paint The Town Red' by Doja Cat, 'Houdini' by Eminem, 'Snooze' by SZA, and 'Fortnight' by Swift and Post Malone, according to MTV.
latest news.title: Megan Thee Stallion conducirá la entrega de los VMAs de MTV

news knowledge.eng_title: Full list of nominees for 2024 MTV VMAs
news knowledge.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominees have been announced. The ceremony will take place on September 11, 2024, at the UBS Arena in Elmont, New York. The nominees include Ariana Grande, Billie Eilish, Doja Cat, Eminem, and SZA for Video of the Year, and Taylor Swift for Artist of the Year. Other nominees include Benson Boone, Chappell Roan, Gracie Abrams, and Teddy Swims for Best New Artist. The nominees for Best Collaboration include Drake ft. Sexyy Red & SZA, GloRilla, Megan Thee Stallion, and Taylor Swift ft. Post Malone. The nominees for Best Pop include Camila Cabello, Dua Lipa, Olivia Rodrigo, Sabrina Carpenter, and Taylor Swift. The nominees for Best Hip-Pop include Drake ft. Sexyy Red & SZA, Eminem, GloRilla, Megan Thee Stallion, and Travis Scott ft. Playboi Carti. The nominees for Best R&B include Alicia Keys, Muni Long, SZA, Tyla, and USHER, Summer Walker, 21 Savage. The nominees for Best Alternative include Benson Boone, Bleachers, Hozier, Imagine Dragons, and Linkin Park. The nominees for Best Rock include Bon Jovi, Coldplay, Green Day, Kings of Leon, and Lenny Kravitz. The nominees for Best Afrobeats include Ayra Starr ft. Giveon, Burna Boy, Chris Brown ft. Davido & Lojay, Tems, and Tyla. The nominees for Best Latin include Anitta, Bad Bunny, KAROL G, Myke Towers, and Peso Pluma & Anitta. The nominees for Best K-Pop include Jung Kook ft. Latto, LISA, NCT Dream, NewJeans, and Stray Kids. The nominees for Video for Good include Alexander Stewart, Billie Eilish, Coldplay, Joyner Lucas & Jelly Roll, and RAYE. The nominees for Best Direction include Ariana Grande, Bleachers, Eminem, Megan Thee Stallion, and Taylor Swift. The nominees for Best Cinematography include Ariana Grande, Charli xcx, Dua Lipa, Olivia Rodrigo, and Taylor Swift. The nominees for Best Editing include Anitta, Ariana Grande, Eminem, LISA, and Taylor Swift. The nominees for Best Choreography include Bleachers, Dua Lipa, LISA, Rauw Alejandro, and Tate McRae. The nominees for Best Visual Effects include Ariana Grande, Eminem, Justin Timberlake, Megan Thee Stallion, and Olivia Rodrigo. The nominees for Best Art Direction include Charli xcx, LISA, Megan Thee Stallion, Olivia Rodrigo, and Taylor Swift.
news knowledge.title: Full list of nominees for 2024 MTV VMAs

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay Announces New Single 'WE PRAY' with TINI, Elyanna, and More

Event: Music Of The Spheres World Tour

news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has announced the release of their new single 'WE PRAY' on August 23. The song features Little Simz, Burna Boy, Elyanna, and TINI. The single was first performed live at Glastonbury 2024 and is available for pre-order in eco-friendly formats. There are five versions of the song: the original, a TINI version, an Elyanna version, a mystery version, and a live version from Glastonbury. The TINI and Elyanna versions will be released on September 6 and 20, respectively. 'WE PRAY' is the second single from their upcoming album 'Moon Music', which will be released on October 4, 2024. The album is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles and is available for pre-order. This follows their previous single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove', which was nominated for two MTV VMA awards and reached number one on the UK radio chart. Coldplay's Music Of The Spheres World Tour, which started in 2022 and has sold over 8 million tickets, is ending tonight in Munich. The tour has produced a 59% reduction in CO2e emissions compared to their 2016/17 stadium tour, exceeding their goal of a 50% reduction. They have also planted 9 million trees, one for each ticket sold.
news knowledge.title: Coldplay anunció la fecha de su nuevo tema junto a Tini

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay Collaborates with Zerb on New Version of 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released a new version of their hit song 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' in collaboration with Brazilian DJ and producer Zerb. The song, which features vibrant touches from the band's latest single, was created with Zerb in the Coldplay's backstage studio during their shows in Düsseldorf last week. The official music video, featuring Chris Martin and Jonny Buckland, was filmed in Helsinki streets earlier this week. Zerb also shared a behind-the-scenes look at the studio session in Düsseldorf. 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' is the first single from Coldplay's upcoming album 'Moon Music', set to be released on October 4, 2024. The album will be made from 100% recycled plastic bottles, with nine bottles per disc. Coldplay previously released a lyric video for the song in July, directed by Raman Djafari and featuring a team of 15 animators from around the world.
news knowledge.title: Coldplay lança versão de ‘feelslikeimfallinginlove' com artista brasileiro

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay and Zerb Release Remix of 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay and Brazilian artist Zerb have released a remix of their song 'feelslikeimfallinginlove', which was created behind the scenes of their shows at the Dusseldorf stadium last week. The music video, featuring Chris Martin and dancer Christian Fandrey, was filmed in the streets of Helsinki this week, between Coldplay's four sold-out shows at the Olympiastadion. 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' is the first single from Coldplay's upcoming tenth album, 'Moon Music', which will be released on October 4, 2024. The album will set new sustainability standards, as each vinyl record is made from nine recycled plastic bottles. The song is available for pre-order on EcoCD, EcoRecord, and digital formats. As reported by Quadratín México, Zerb also feels like he's falling in love with Coldplay's music.
news knowledge.title: Zerb también se siente como si se estuviera enamorando como Coldplay Quadratín México

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay Releases Official Lyric Video for 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released the official lyric video for their latest single, 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'. The video was created by renowned director Raman Djafari through Blinkink, and features a team of 15 animators from around the world. The concept of the video focuses on a couple's journey to find each other, told in three chapters: desire, search, and discovery. The video is also a preview of 'A Film For The Future', a project that the band has been teasing for five years. The album's booklet, Everyday Life, includes a photo of an old car with the FFTF2024 license plate and a billboard for the next album, Music of the Spheres. 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' is the first single from the band's upcoming tenth album, Moon Music, set to be released on October 4, 2024. The album will set new sustainability standards, with each LP made from 100% recycled plastic bottles (nine bottles per disc). Pre-orders are available on EcoCD, EcoRecord LP, and digital.
news knowledge.title: Coldplay, online il lyric video "feelslikeimfallinginlove"

news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released the lyric video for their latest single, 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'. The video was directed by Raman Djafari and features 15 animators from around the world. The concept of the video revolves around a couple searching for each other and finally finding each other, with three chapters: longing, searching, and meeting. The video also gives a first glimpse of 'A Film For The Future', a project that has been announced by the band for five years. The single is the first from the band's upcoming album, 'Moon Music', which will be released on October 4, 2024. The album will set new sustainability standards, with each LP made from 100% recycled plastic bottles (nine bottles per disc). Coldplay also performed a new song, 'Good Feelings', during a show in Italy, with Chris Martin singing 'We fell in love in the summer/I remember baby, we felt the sun shine through/And we were born for each other.' The song has been rumored to be a collaboration with the Chainsmokers, but the new version will feature vocals from Nigerian singer Ayra Starr.
news knowledge.title: Coldplay lança lyric video do single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'

news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released the music video for their new single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove', filmed in Athens. The video was directed by Ben Mor, who previously worked on the video for 'Hymn For The Weekend' with Beyoncé. The video features actress, writer, and narrator Natasha Ofili, who also wrote and directed the creative direction. Ofili created her own interpretation of the song in American Sign Language. The video also includes the participation of deaf members of the Venezuelan Sign Language (LSV) choir from the White Hands Ensemble, in collaboration with the Dudamel Foundation. The release follows Coldplay's show at the Glastonbury Festival, which received rave reviews and was broadcast live around the world by the BBC. The song is the first single from their upcoming tenth album, Moon Music, which will be released on October 4, 2024. The album will set new sustainability standards, with each vinyl record made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.
news knowledge.title: Luego de un gran Glastonbury 2024: Coldplay estrenó videoclip de 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay's New Single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' Music Video Features ASL Interpretation
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay released the music video for their new single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove', which was filmed at the ancient Odeón of Herodes Atticus in Athens, Greece. The video features actress, writer, and narrator Natasha Ofili, who also wrote the script and creative direction. The video includes American Sign Language (ASL) interpretation by Ofili, as well as the participation of deaf sign language interpreters from the Venezuelan Sign Language (LSV) section of the White Hands Choir from Barquisimeto, Venezuela, in collaboration with the Dudamel Foundation. The video follows the band's Saturday night show at the Glastonbury Festival, which received five-star reviews from publications such as The Times, The Independent, The Guardian, The i, and The Telegraph. The single is the first from their upcoming tenth album, 'Moon Music', set to be released on October 4, 2024, which will set new sustainability standards, as each vinyl record is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.
news knowledge.title: En video también se siente como si Coldplay se estuviera enamorando

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay Unveils New Single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' with a Powerful Music Video
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released the music video for their new single, 'feelslikeimfallinginlove'. The video was shot at the ancient Odeon of Herodes Atticus in Athens, Greece, in front of a invited audience through the band's social media. The director is Ben Mor, who also directed the video for 'Hymn For The Weekend' with Beyoncé. The video features actress, writer, and narrator Natasha Ofili, who also wrote the story and creative direction of the video. Ofili also performed the song in American Sign Language, which is featured throughout the video. The video also includes members of the Venezuelan Sign Language section of the Coro de Manos Blancas (Coro delle Mani Bianche) of El Sistema Venezuela, a world-renowned artistic ensemble from Barquisimeto, supported by the Dudamel Foundation. The premiere follows the band's headlining concert at the Glastonbury Festival on Saturday night, which received five-star reviews from publications such as The Times, The Independent, The Guardian, and The Telegraph, which described it as 'one of the great sets at Glastonbury'. 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' is the first single from Coldplay's tenth album, Moon Music, set to be released on October 4, 2024. The album, which will set new sustainability standards, with every LP made from 100% recycled plastic bottles (nine bottles per disc), is already available for pre-order on EcoCD, EcoRecord LP, and digital.
news knowledge.title: I Coldplay presentano il video del nuovo singolo: l'amore può davvero farci volare

news knowledge.eng_title: Coldplay share 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' video following Glastonbury headline performance
news knowledge.summary: Coldplay has released the music video for their single 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' following their headlining performance at Glastonbury 2024. The video features American Sign Language (ASL) interpretation by Natasha Ofili and the Deaf members of the Venezuelan Sign Language (LSV) section from El Sistema Venezuela's Coro de Manos Blancas (White Hands Choir). The band's 10th studio album, 'Moon Music', is set for release on October 4. The album may be the last from Coldplay, as the band has hinted they will stop releasing albums in 2025. Frontman Chris Martin has expressed his love for making music, but also the intensity of the process. The band's performance at Glastonbury was well-received, with fans and critics praising their set. Michael J. Fox was a surprise guest during the encore, and fans also reacted to Chris Martin's apparent accent change during the performance.
news knowledge.title: Coldplay share 'feelslikeimfallinginlove' video following Glastonbury headline performance
